overview: This plot-oriented adventure begins with the older Demi Dantric and Chrissy Nova discussing a subject of promiscuous tendencies to one another in the kitchen. Chrissy confesses to Demi that she isn't exactly into boys and that she has thought of being with a woman before. This admission excited the older Demi who proceeds to engage Chrissy in a more intimate manner. Three more sensual scenes of similar exploration await in the newest edition of the popular series.
tagline: Old and young lesbians come together for some good old fashion lovin!
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 45
